survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with current corporate wellness programs and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current corporate wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current corporate wellness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following wellness program components have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Mental health support (e.g., counseling, meditation apps)
Nutritional counseling or healthy eating programs
questions.client_notes: Ensure mobile-friendly checkbox layout for multi-select options.

script.question_text: Which of the following wellness program components have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Mental health support (e.g., counseling, meditation apps)
Nutritional counseling or healthy eating programs

questions.question_text: What additional wellness programs or resources would you like to see offered?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What additional wellness programs or resources would you like to see offered?

questions.question_text: How has participation in wellness programs impacted your overall job satisfaction?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use conditional routing to target only participants.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Display only if Q2 has selections other than 'None of the above'.

script.question_text: How has participation in wellness programs impacted your overall job satisfaction?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None of the above' in Q2

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating more actively in wellness programs?
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
Lack of awareness about available programs
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with open text for unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating more actively in wellness programs?
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
Lack of awareness about available programs
